name: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2 - The Rise of the Witch-king
name_original: The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2 - The Rise of the Witch-king
description:
The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2 - The Rise of the Witch-king is a strategy game developed by Electronic Arts Los Angeles. It was originally released in 2006. Electronic Arts published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth 2 - The Rise of the Witch-king is available on PC.
